PARTNERS.TITLE: csgo-cash.com
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: Service in which the participants contribute their items (skins) and when the total is 100 items or 3 minutes from the second deposit, the system determines 1 winner, who gets all the items. The winner is determined randomly, the chance of winning depends on the cost of the contributed skins.

PARTNERS.TITLE: mrskini.com
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: The main goal of the "Mrskini" project is the development of a program to help all gamers on the ground, able to provide items and skins in their favorite game. After you become a member of the "Mrskini" system, you will immediately understand that it is not so difficult to receive a large number of items to your account.

PARTNERS.TITLE: boomcsgo.com
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: Service where CS:GO players can try their luck and get awesome skins! Just deposit your skins to the raffle, become a winner and sweep the board!
